name: hrevert/ht-country-module
description: A Zend Framework 2 module for country and subdivision data.

suggest.zendframework/zend-servicemanager: To use the services provided by this module
suggest.zendframework/zend-modulemanager: If you want to use it as a Zend Framework 2 module
suggest.zendframework/zend-stdlib: To use hydrator strategy provided by this module
